video_description: Here is Lisa Gade's in-depth review of the Samsung Galaxy Note Android smartphone. Here is Lisa's full written review: http://www.mobiletechreview.com/phones/Samsung-Galaxy-Note.htm The Note has a 5.3", 1280 x 800 pixel Super AMOLED HD display and it runs on a 1.4GHz dual core Exynos CPU. We look at the international GSM unlocked version that has 3G/4G HSPA+ 21Mbps on the AT&T bands.
title: Samsung Galaxy Note Review
